text: Threshold was Swedish power metal band HammerFall's fifth album. == Track listing == # "Threshold" (Dronjak/Cans) – 4:43 # "The Fire Burns Forever" (Dronjak/Cans) – 3:20 # "Rebel Inside" (Dronjak) – 5:32 # "Natural High" (Dronjak/Cans) – 4:13 # "Dark Wings, Dark Words" (Dronjak/Cans) – 5:01 # "Howlin' with the 'Pac" (Dronjak/Cans) – 4:04 # "Shadow Empire" (Dronjak/Cans/Elmgren) – 5:13 # "Carved in Stone" (Dronjak/Cans) – 6:10 # "Reign of the Hammer" (Elmgren) – 2:48 # "Genocide" (Dronjak/Cans/Elmgren) – 4:41 # "Titan" (Dronjak/Cans) – 4:24 == Personnel == * Joacim Cans - Lead & Backing Vocals * Oscar Dronjak - Guitars & Backing Vocals * Stefan Elmgren - Guitars & Backing Vocals * Magnus Rosén - Bass * Anders Johansson - Drums ==References== Category:Power metal Category:HammerFall albums Category:2006 albums Category:Nuclear Blast albums
title: Threshold (album)
